channel.title: Webhook on vNinja.net
channel.description: Recent content in Webhook on vNinja.net

item.title: HomeLabOps via Slack
item.description: Just like Lior Kamrat I’ve set up my own private Slack for messaging and alerting from various services running both in my lab and some external facing services.  It’s only been running a few days, but so far it works brilliantly and helps me keep track.
